version_description: - Bugs are fixed in Multiplayer Mode
- Bugs are fixed in Multiplayer Mode

We regularly develop our game for you.
If you regularly update, you will have the best gaming experience.

We regularly develop our game for you.
If you regularly update, you will have the best gaming experience.

- Daily Gift is added (20 Online Points).
- Users' life are increased from 10 to 15 in Single Play Mode.
- Minor bugs are fixed.

- Rank System was added according to the online score.
- Added 3 different online game modes by rank.
- Added 33 quests where you can earn online points and friendship requests.
- Fixed some freezing bugs.

- My profile section has been added.
- You can hide the chat with one touch.
- In addition to rejecting incoming friend requests, blacklisting feature has also been added. (You will no longer see friend requests received from users on your blacklist).
- Incoming friend requests can be completely hidden.
- The duration of the featured part has been increased from 1 day to 2 days.

- You can complain about your opponent in online mode.

- When our users who have logged in with Facebook are logged in again, their user names were returning to their previous state. That problem has been fixed.
- Please read the rules carefully. We have introduced stricter rules for our valued members to play safely.

- You can complain about your opponent in online mode.
- You can block friends.
